events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering for the Software Engineer role based on the skills and experience you provided.
A recruiter from our Engineering team has been assigned to your profile and will reach out to you soon about the next steps.
We completed your initial screening and are impressed with your background; we would like to proceed with scheduling a technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
Congratulations, you completed the technical interview with excellent problem-solving skills and a strong understanding of software development concepts.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 15th at 11:00 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and further details of the role.
The HR interview has been successfully completed; we found you to be a great fit for the team and look forward to moving ahead.
We have extended a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including compensation and benefits details, sent to your email.
You responded positively to the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about stock options and remote work policies.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started; welcome packets and access credentials have been sent to you.
The hiring process for you is now closed with a successful hire; we look forward to your contributions in the engineering department.
